backend/main.mo: Defines types and comparison helpers for user profiles, roles, channels, servers, messages, audit logs, and includes authorization mixin state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring authentication, profile setup, theming, navigation, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Provides custom auth context managing session tokens, login/register placeholders, and session restoration.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, validating, and clearing persisted session data in localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Simple hook that returns the authentication context.
Layout wrapper for authentication screens with centered card UI and app branding.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a collapsible category with text and voice channels and a button to create new channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Modal dialog to create a new server category, handling form input and backend mutation state.
Modal dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, with type selection and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Input composer for sending messages in a text channel with backend validation and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected text channel, auto-scrolls, and includes the message composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, and role-based color styling.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Allows users to search and browse community servers and join them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Displays a server summary card with name, description, member count, and join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows either the friends view or a placeholder direct messages screen based on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend entry with avatar, name, status, and action buttons including messaging and profile options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Displays friends lists, pending requests, and a form to add friends using tabs and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Lays out the desktop UI with server rail, sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to render based on navigation state, including home, server channels, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Implements mobile layout with slide‑in sheets for servers, channels, members, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on window width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Shows a scrollable list of server members with avatars, roles, and a click handler to select a member.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Displays either the home sidebar or the server channel/category list with actions and settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Top bar for mobile providing navigation buttons, server/channel access, and user settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Renders the left server navigation rail, listing servers in ordered form and providing controls for home navigation and creating a server.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog that prompts users to choose a display name and saves the initial profile on submit.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing roles from a user, with async handling and pending state tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Displays a member’s profile overlay with avatar, banner, roles, and optional role management controls.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and optional description, handling backend limits and form submission.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Shows a server’s icon or a fallback initial if no icon URL is provided.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog component for creating text or voice channels, handling form state, category selection, and submitting mutations.
Dialog for moving a channel to another category, providing category selection and invoking a callback on confirmation.
Panel for selecting a server member, viewing their roles, and opening a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays the server audit log with formatted events, timestamps, and user IDs, including loading and error states.
Manages category and channel organization, including creating channels, reordering, and moving channels between categories.
Server settings page for editing description, icon, banner, and community mode, with save functionality tied to backend updates.
UI panel to select a server member, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays server roles, allows creating new roles with permissions, and includes a panel for assigning roles to members.
Layout shell for server settings with a sidebar of pages and dynamic page rendering based on selection.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users change theme and adjust text scaling through radio buttons and a slider.
Form for editing user profile fields like username, name, status, about me, and avatar/banner URLs with save actions.
Container for user settings navigation, switching between profile and appearance pages, and providing logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
Renders a static stage channel view showing speakers, audience members, and a raise-hand button.
Handles joining/leaving voice channels, showing participants, and providing basic mute/deafen UI states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Determines whether backend actions should be disabled based on connection state and errors.
Combines safe actor initialization with a backend health check to expose connection status and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login, logout, and identity initialization/loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Wraps logout logic and clears all react-query caches on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many backend data queries and mutations with friendly error handling using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retry and initialization state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for dark and light modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign-in and sign-up forms with validation and auth error handling.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Defines navigation context and provider managing view state, selections, settings panels, and category expansion.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Handles notification override storage in localStorage and provides helpers to check muted servers or channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Provides settings context with persistence for theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Removes a specific DOM element via XPath and sets up a MutationObserver to keep removing it if reinserted.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Validates hex role colors and provides luminance-based contrast and light/dark checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and session parameters, persisting them, and cleaning sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, layout, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architectural notes, and pending account-system refactor tasks.
